questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: 10 years from now, I hope to be a successful architect, working on ambitious projects around the world. I will have my own family, a supportive partner, and a happy, balanced life. I will also have traveled extensively, broadening my horizons and expanding my understanding of different cultures.
